column5: Refuge at the Lake is the ideal place to escape from your busy and hectic everyday life! The house is perfect for families or friends to connect, have fun, relax, and explore! Take it all in and refresh both mind and body while enjoying all the amenities you'd expect and some you didn't even know you needed!  Close to many local attractions and events for when you feel like getting out, the property is quiet and serene enough to make you feel as though you're hours away from the city.
